DataElement.preferredName: Echocardiogram Measurement of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction Test Method Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information in regards to the method of an image of the heart produced by ultrasonography with text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Echocardiogram Measurement of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction Test Method
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography._A measure of how much blood the left ventricle of the heart pumps out with each contraction. With each beat, a normal heart ejects about one-half to two-thirds of the blood in its left chamber._A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Echocardiogram Measurement of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.:A measure of how much blood the left ventricle of the heart pumps out with each contraction. With each beat, a normal heart ejects about one-half to two-thirds of the blood in its left chamber.

Concepts.definition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.

Concepts.longName: Measurement of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction
Concepts.definition: A measure of how much blood the left ventricle of the heart pumps out with each contraction. With each beat, a normal heart ejects about one-half to two-thirds of the blood in its left chamber.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
